title: i lose my champion from account last night pls help me
body: I speend my ip on buying champions shard for 1700ip,from that i got nidale and brand on my acc Smorkee45 EUNE .. and last night got Oriana,,beacose i have brand and nidale already i d/s them and use Oriana ,after that i have bug in client and when i reset client i don't have anymore blue essesns and i don't have Champion Oriana,pls help me!

replies.body: We're seeing a lot of EU players having issues with the store over the past two days. The best way for us to get everyone fixed up in the quickest amount of time would be to start shooting us [**tickets**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). That way we'll be able to get a handle of everyone who was affected and push out a fix as soon as possible.
